movie.title: Saving Mr. Banks
movie.plot: Author P.L. Travers travels from London to Hollywood as Walt Disney Pictures adapts her novel Mary Poppins for the big screen.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 14 wins & 72 nominations.
